Package: sk.hax.software.darksigns.api

[Groovy] Class MailMessage

    • sk.hax.software.darksigns.api.MailMessage

    • Representation of a mail message. Contains properties for mail message fields like sender, recipient, subject and body. Is able to transform itself to a datagram that can be sent out to the network. The datagram has the correct destination set. This class can be used to facilitate building of mail messages.

      Authors:
      mio

      • Property Detail

        • java.lang.String body

          The message content itself.

        • java.lang.String from

          Identification of the sender. An arbitrary string, which by convention should contain the network address.

        • java.lang.String subject

          Subject of the message.

        • java.lang.String to

          Identification of the recipient. String representation of a network address. Optionally with a prefix in the form '@'.

      • Constructor Detail

        • MailMessage()

        • MailMessage(java.lang.String message)

      • Method Detail

        • Datagram toDatagram()

          Transforms the mail message into a datagram. The resulting datagram is ready to be sent out to the network. Note that the port of the datagram is set to 25 by default.

          Returns:
          datagram representing the mail message
